cu.explanation_en: Setting amf_ip_address.ipv4 to an invalid IP address format will cause AMF communication failure and prevent proper network attachment.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity to 20 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper TDD periodicity setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity 設定為 20 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的 TDD 週期設置。
